description: Details required by Condition 6 (Part M4(2) Compliance), 7 (Landscaping Scheme), 9 (Refuse and Recycling), 14 (Part M4(3) Compliance), 16 (Electric Charging Spaces), 17 (Cycle Parking), 18 (Building/Road Levels), 24 (Details of Balconies, Windows/Doors,Canopies, Boundaries) of Planning Permission 15/16883/FUL (Demolition of former health centre; change of use and extension to No.3 Oakhill and erection of 2 no. four-storey residential blocks including accommodation in roof space (41 no. residential flats in total comprising 16 x one bedroom, 17 x two-bedroom and 8 x three bedroom units))
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Conditions  6 (Part M4(2) Compliance), 7 (Landscaping Scheme), 9 (Refuse and Recycling), 14 (Part M4(3) Compliance), 16 (Electric Charging Spaces), 17 (Cycle Parking), 18 (Building/Road Levels), 24 (Details of Balconies, Windows/Doors,Canopies, Boundaries) of planning permission 15/16883/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.

This permission should be read in conjunction with the legal agreement under section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act dated 23rd December 2020, the obligations in which relate to this development.

Please revise and resubmit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue.Please note that the complete site to be outlined in red, not just part.
